p: The effects of ethanol extract of A. cepa (100, 500, and 1000 μg/mL) on osteoclastogenesis under LPS-induced inflammatory conditions, were examined in RAW264.7 cells. Findings showed that A. cepa reduced the production of IL-6 and IL-1α, increased the production of IL-3 and IL-4, and down regulated NF-κB pathway (Oliveira, Figueiredo et al. 2015).
